name: Flying Bike 2016 – Moto Racer Driving Adventure with Air Plane Controls
name_original: Flying Bike 2016 – Moto Racer Driving Adventure with Air Plane Controls
description:
Gear up for a stunt twist with flying bike inspired by the flying car games and racing bike stunt simulators. Be the extreme pilot and traffic rider on the futuristic highway. Captain the moto bike like the super a large variety of flying motorbikes, stunt bikes, dirt bikes, motorcycle and motorcross. Burn the asphalt at unstoppable speed while driving as a traffic rider in the future city. Speed up by switching to the newest futuristic flying stunt bike racing games.

Time travel to the future, fly the xtreme trial stunt bike on the America highway rather than being a moto bike traffic racer heroes in America. Earn points to unlock the turbo engines and enjoy piloting and motobike driving in the future city. Avoid crashing into the skyscapers of the American city. Perform motorbike stunts in the sky like never before and collects coins hidden in the latest flying simulator games edition of FLYING STUNT BIKE 2016 Simulator.

Become the new skyman and put the stuntman to shame in this flying bike simulator. Gear up Fanatic fans of stunt bike racing games, highway bike racer and futuristic flying car driving simulator games. Fly freely in the newest xtreme trial bike racer. Enjoy the extreme stunt flight like a real stuntman hero in this flying stunt bike 2016 simulator.
